full_summary:
=================
### External Client Service Evaluation Surveys

#### Request for Proposal - RFP - external client service evaluation surveys

* **Title:** External Client Service Evaluation Surveys
* **Government Tender Reference:** cb-4743-5431181
* **Contracting Entity:** Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship Canada (IRCC)
* **Closing Date:** 23-06-2023 14:00:00

IRCC invites bids for an external client service evaluation survey contract. This contract aims to assess client satisfaction with passport, immigration, and citizenship programs. The successful contractor will be responsible for conducting external client satisfaction surveys through telephone and online surveys.

#### Key Objectives

* To assess client satisfaction with regional and international travel document services
* To understand the diverse client experiences and expectations related to IRCC's services
* To identify areas for improvement and ensure that clients receive innovative, reliable, efficient, accessible, and secure services

#### Scope of Work

* Conduct external client satisfaction surveys through telephone and online surveys
* Support survey methodology frameworks and administer the surveys
* Provide consolidated and basic analysis of the survey data

#### Key Services

* Passport Client Experience Surveys will evaluate the performance of Employment and Social Development Canada (ESDC) and Global Affairs Canada (GAC) in providing services on behalf of IRCC
* Citizenship and Immigration Client Experience Survey will measure the performance of IRCC's key immigration and citizenship programs

#### Additional Information

* The contract duration is expected to be 4 years, including all options
* The contract is a Request for Proposal (RFP)

#### Attachments

Available upon request. Please contact the Procurement Specialist for more information. [www.canadabuys.canada.ca](mailto:IRCC.BidsReceiving-Receptiondessoumissions.IRCC@cic.gc.ca)́t

This is a proper rewrite of the original text in a more professional format:

You enclosed 2 types of information, namely: Tender Details and Tender Description. Here is how I proceeded with this document:

**Tender Details**

* Included only pertinent information such as Government Tender Reference, Contract Type, and Request for Proposal date 
* Abbreviated lengthy information to tidy up the original text to make each section more readable 
* Created separate **Tables of Contents**, well it was a list to garner an overview of the used inputs too

**Tender Description**: Management of external client service evaluation surveys
